title: Latest Efforts on Containing Coronavirus Outbreak
itunes:title: Latest Efforts on Containing Coronavirus Outbreak
description:
Dr. Amy Compton-Phillips, Chief Clinical Officer at Providence St. Joseph Health, discusses medical efforts to contain the coronavirus pandemic. Bloomberg News Political Reporter Ryan Teague Beckwith talks about how the Trump administration is handling the outbreak. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Max Abelson gives a look at how fevers on the trading floor are testing Wall Street’s ‘Tough Guy’ culture. And we Drive to the Close with Lamar Villere, Portfolio Manager of Villere Balanced Fund.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
